poem:
Title: "Changing Tides in Political Shores"

Beneath the stern gaze of Le Pen,
Rise whispers from the AfD's den.
In their ruckus, a plea for isolation,
A rally cry for fractured nation.
Yet, the Greens vow to quell reprisal,
Where provocation seeks revival.
A clean break echoes in the air,
Cordon Sanitaire, handle with care.
The political beast shifts form and height,
In the trembling dawn of the far-right.
